channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- Easergy Builder Installer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- Easergy Builder Installer

item.title: CVE-2022-34755|2024-08-03T09:22:10.645Z -- schneider%20electric -- easergy%20builder%20installer
item.description: A CWE-427 - Uncontrolled Search Path Element vulnerability exists that could allow an attacker with a local privileged account to place a specially crafted file on the target machine, which may give the attacker the ability to execute arbitrary code during the installation process initiated by a valid user. Affected Products: Easergy Builder InstallerÂ (1.7.23 and prior)
